channel.title: GCOG Registration Now Open
channel.description:
Registration is now open for our next Gauntlet Community Open Gaming on Monday September 20th at 1200 Eastern time. The event happens October 14th-17th and everything's free. We do ask that community members limit themselves to one sign-up per day for the first week to give new players an opportunity. If you see or hear anyone posting about having problems signing up-- *message me* . There's a manual step to approving registrations. It only takes a moment, but I have to spot it when I check the site or when someone gives me a heads up.
It would really, really help if you could share info about the convention: tweet about it, post on Facebook, on Discords, Instragram, etc. It would be great to get the word out to folks who haven't played online and/or with us before.
The Event Listing is here: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/events You can direct folks to more info here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-community-open-gaming.html ![GCOG 16_9|690x387](upload://gFkz9oOktx86TuPYGOIBNT1ExL7.jpeg)

item.title: GCOG Registration Now Open
